question.title: How to convert String with format "2024-08-19 00:20:04.0 +2:00" to datetime format in Scala
question.body:
I have string and I wanted to converted to toLocalDateTime with the same format. But when I try the same format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.S Z" it failed to convert because it did not parse the timezone offset :

LocalDateTime.parse("2024-08-19 00:20:04.0 +2:00",java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.S Z"))

It gives below errors :

 LocalDateTime.parse("2024-08-19 00:20:04.0 +2:00",java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.S Z"))
java.time.format.DateTimeParseException: Text '2024-08-19 00:20:04.0 +2:00' could not be parsed at index 22
  at java.base/java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter.parseResolved0(DateTimeFormatter.java:2056)
  at java.base/java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter.parse(DateTimeFormatter.java:1958)
  at java.base/java.time.LocalDateTime.parse(LocalDateTime.java:494)
  ... 30 elided

I try to replace Z by z but the same issue , also I try replace Z by a still the same error is there are a way to convert string contain timezone offset like "+2:00" to datetime in below format : "2024-08-19 00:20:04.0 +2:00"
